titleStmt.title: The comfort of the soul laid down by way of meditation upon some heads of Christian religion, very profitable for every true Christian. Composed and written by Iohn Anthony of London Doctor of Physick.
titleStmt.author: Anthony, John, 1585-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Dawson, and are to be sold by John Mountague, at the sign of the White-Dragon in Duck-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the White-Dragon in Duck-Lane
